description.dateTimeFormat:
Date and time display format. Supported placeholders:
- YYYY: Four-digit year
- MM: Two-digit month (01-12)
- DD: Two-digit day (01-31)
- HH: Two-digit hour (00-23)
- mm: Two-digit minute (00-59)
- ss: Two-digit second (00-59)
description.fileSizeBase: File size calculation base. Choose 1000 (decimal, using KB / MB / GB units) or 1024 (binary, using KiB / MiB / GiB units).
description.fileTemplate:
Display template for file hover tooltips. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: File name
- {size}: File size with automatic units
- {rawSize}: Raw file size (in bytes)
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time
description.folderCalculator.dismissDela: Delay (in seconds) before the folder calculation result in the status bar automatically disappears, range: 0-3600 seconds. Set to 0 to not auto-dismiss, can only be closed manually by clicking.
description.folderCalculator.statusBarTe:
Display template for folder calculation results in the status bar. Supported placeholders:
- {folderName}: Folder name
- {totalSize}: Total size with automatic units
- {fileCount}: Number of files
- {folderCount}: Number of folders
- {modifiedTime}: Last modified time
description.imageFileTemplate:
Display template for image file hover tooltips. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: File name
- {size}: File size with automatic units
- {rawSize}: Raw file size (in bytes)
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time
- {resolution}: Image resolution
- {width}: Image width
- {height}: Image height
description.imageResolutionTemplate:
Display template for image resolution information. Supported placeholders:
- {width}: Image width in pixels
- {height}: Image height in pixels
description.largeFileThreshold: Large file recognition threshold in user-configured units (MB or MiB). Files exceeding this size will display a 'L' badge. Set to 0 to disable large file recognition.
description.startupDelay: Delay (in seconds) before the extension starts working after VSCode startup. Set to 0 for no delay (calculates immediately on startup).
